title: The Latest Cancellations in The Sports World (Podcast)
itunes:title: The Latest Cancellations in The Sports World (Podcast)
description:
Michael Barr, Mike Lynch and Richard Truman talk to the biggest names in sports. Today we assess the latest covid-19 cancellations in the sports world and the effects on this weekend’s college football. We also talk about what’s next for Tiger Woods after his performance alongside son Charlie Woods at the PNC Championship. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
